Photo by freestocks.org on Unsplash
https://unsplash.com/photos/9UVmlIb0wJU First I would like to thank all people who contributed in any way on this project. They submitted issues, translated or helped in any other way. On following sites you can become a active member of this great community:

XDA-thread:
XDA is a great community for developers and smartphone enthusiasts. Here you can report issues, ask for new features and everything other related to \"FOSS Image Editor\".
https://forum.xda-developers.com/android/apps-games/app-browser-t3500091

Github:
On Github you can see the source code of \"FOSS Image Editor\". This is the more technical solution: open issues, ask for new features or even help developing or translating.
https://github.com/scoute-dich/FOSSImageEditor


Following people contributed at this project. If I have forgotten anybody, please contact me:

Gaukler Faun
\u25AA Main developer and initiator of this project
https://github.com/scoute-dich FOSS Image Editor can only open pictures stored inthe public folders (DCIM, PICTURES, DOWNLOADS, â€¦). All other pictures can not be opened. But FOSS Image Editor needs no permissions
